vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀποσυν-άγωγος [ᾰγ], ον,
expelled from the synagogue, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: put out of the synagogue, excommunicated
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
put out of the synagogue, excommunicated
expelled, or excluded from the synagogue, excommunicated, cut off from the rights and privileges of a Jew, excluded from society, Jn. 9:22; 12:42; 16:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: excomulgado o expulsado de la sinagoga
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 被以色列人從會堂驅逐的, 被禁止的, 被排除的 (約 9:22, 12:42, 16:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 被以色列人从会堂驱逐的, 被禁止的, 被排除的 (约 9:22, 12:42, 16:2)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà hội
